ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 2.3 - PLEASE READ THIS!
ygData.msgSnippet: go with the website, every time.  Rokken tests, retests and gets other bards to test stuff before he posts it as fact. I use Rokken s site almost exclusively
ygData.messageBody:
go with the website, every time. Rokken tests, retests and gets other bards
to test stuff before he posts it as fact.

I use Rokken's site almost exclusively now because so many bards submit
facts to him.
